catalog_script_client.name: If user safety services company

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_1c2385521b81919062e50ed2cd4bcb33
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Termination">60f281121b81919062e50ed2cd4bcb6d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d93c28591b492050e7004229bc4bcb0d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>If user safety services company</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange() {
	g_form.setVisible('company_credit_card',false);
	g_form.setVisible('company_gas_card',false);
	var user = g_form.getValue('Person_Leaving');
	var checkIfWesternSt = new GlideAjax('OffboardingHelper');
	checkIfWesternSt.addParam('sysparm_name', 'isSafetyServicesCompany');
	checkIfWesternSt.addParam('sysparm_user_id', user);
	checkIfWesternSt.getXML(ajaxResponse);
}

function ajaxResponse(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	if (answer == "true") {
		g_form.setVisible('company_credit_card',true);
		g_form.setVisible('company_gas_card',true);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-03 13:36:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1c2385521b81919062e50ed2cd4bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>If user safety services company</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Termination Process Core">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1c2385521b81919062e50ed2cd4bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-03 13:36:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
